solution_line_template: He goes to.school {school_days_per_week} days a week so if he misses {days_missed} days within the week he was present for {school_days_per_week}-{days_missed} = <<{school_days_per_week}-{days_missed}={days_present}>>{days_present} days
He spends {hours_per_day} hours every day for a total of {hours_per_day}*{days_present} = <<{hours_per_day}*{days_present}={total_hours_spent}>>{total_hours_spent} hours
